results.name: Joseph French and the Batter Wars

requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Microsoft Windows 10 / 11
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-3240 or AMD Athlon X4 880K
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9c-compatible graphics card with at least 4GB of video memory
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
